name: A Ruin Called Hope
description:
In A Ruin Called Hope, you guide three young people as they inspect an old house they've just purchased from the bank. Inside, bad blood will boil over, and the three youths will need to find a way out.

My entry for the 14th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam. It was my first time using RPG Maker, so it's a bit cursed. Fitting for a haunted house.

Content Warnings for:

  • Physical and Psychological Abuse
  • Transphobia
  • Transphobic slurs
